report.title: Weak euphoria
report.author: anon
report.bodytext: I have done only a few other drugs and this is probably not in top 3 for me...I've done hydrocodone a pill I haven't heard of anywhere but here called L's xanax klonopin and marijuana several times, but this is worth trying. /n /n 12:00 pm /n Took 4 50mg pills ate a pb&j and watched Fox News nothing yet. /n /n 12:30 /n Started feeling really light...Starting to feel pretty good. Mellow and just peaceful. /n /n 1:15 /n Starting to feel very relaxed, I'm starting to feel a nice body high just...great. /n /n 1:30 /n I think I might be at the plateau I just feel really...peaceful and lazy and mellowed out. /n /n 2:00 /n Very euphoric and cant help from smiling. I feel great. Just...ahh =] /n /n 2:48 /n I think Im coming down. Not bad at all overall the whole thing is feeling like a hydrocodone trip without getting the nods. I love it. /n /n 3:30 /n Welp its kinda wearing off. Still feel great. Body high is still there. Just feel peaceful. /n /n 4:10 /n Welp back to normal. Still feeling great. just a little nauseated. But it was pretty good. =]
